title: KitKatZ
author: KitKatZ
content: Looking for someone to write up a detailed tutorial on how to install and setup Ck Pool to  a  Ubuntu 18.04 64bit VPS. Keep in mind it CK pool will need to link to Bitcoin Core Latest version: 22.0 . Bonus for super detailed on how Ck pool works as well . Source : https://bitbucket.org/ckolivas/ckpool/src/master/

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: Hey,I will do it for you Check PM
